thread.title: The UPS Store® celebrates 10 years in Canada
thread.title_full: The UPS Store® celebrates 10 years in Canada - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: The UPS Store® celebrates 10 years in Canada
text:
UPS Canada Ltd.
MISSISSAUGA, ON , Oct. 8, 2015 /CNW/ - UPS (NYSE:UPS) marked the 10 th anniversary of The UPS Store in Canada when Michael Tierney , president of UPS Canada, spoke to The UPS Store Convention in Montreal . Tierney congratulated franchisees and the network for being a leading one-stop business service location for small businesses. During the past 10 years The UPS Store has built the tradition of excellence in providing its customers with a wide range of services tailored to meet the needs of small business in all stages of their business growth.
"The UPS Store is the essential retail face of our brand," said Michael Tierney . "Together, we offer our customers multiple service options and solutions and I would like to congratulate them on 10 successful years in Canada ."
The UPS Store serves as a dependable resource, offering insight and practical solutions to the endless array of needs all small business owners face. In addition to offering well-recognized services like packing and shipping, printing, faxing, direct mail, and mailbox services, The UPS Store works with business owners to develop custom solutions to ensure their unique business needs are met.
"It is hard to believe that we have already zoomed through ten years of assisting small businesses in Canada as The UPS Store," said David Druker , president, The UPS Store Canadian master licensee. "We believe in the value that our franchisees provide every day to the growth and success of small businesses in Canada , an important sector of the Canadian economy. We are very proud of the success of our brand, and of our franchisees who work every day to exceed their clients' expectations."
This recent milestone is a fitting example of UPS's commitment to serving the needs of our valued partners and small businesses in Canada . For more information about The UPS Store Canada, please visit http://theupsstore.ca/
The UPS Store locations in Canada are independently owned and operated by licensed franchisees of The UPS Store, Inc.'s master licensee in Canada , MBEC Communications Inc.
About UPS
UPS (NYSE: UPS) is a global leader in logistics, offering a broad range of solutions including transporting packages and freight; facilitating international trade, and deploying advanced technology to more efficiently manage the world of business. UPS is committed to operating more sustainably – for customers, the environment and the communities we serve around the world. Learn more about our efforts at ups.com/sustainability . Headquartered in Atlanta , UPS serves more than 220 countries and territories worldwide. The company can be found on the web at ups.com® and its corporate blog can be found at longitudes.ups.com . To get UPS news direct, visit pressroom.ups.com/RSS .
About The UPS Store
The UPS Store in Canada is a network of over 360 independently owned and franchised locations providing convenient and value-added business services to the small-office/home-office (SOHO) market, corporate "road warriors," and consumers.
